Vietnam's coffee market has
never recorded record high prices like
today, from raw materials to export prices.
This has motivated coffee growers to

However, high prices are also causing

five months before the
2024 Paris Olympics on February 29
French president  Emmanuel officially cut
the ribbon to inaugurate the Olympic Games Village in the
Northern Suburbs of Paris. This will be the focal
point of the Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games
as well as the home of nearly 14,500
athletes from 206 countries
participating in a total of 82 buildings.  3,000 apartments and
7,200 rooms spread over 52 hectares The
Olympic Village was officially born after 7 years of
construction. I'm proud of the work
everyone has done here within
budget and on time.
Our members will have the opportunity to experience the
Olympics in the best conditions. You have

rooms will be shared.  a bathroom

Olympics, the project will be converted
